short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and submit reviews for Ontario Parks campsites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your camping experience with the Ontario Parks Reviews Extension! This tool seamlessly integrates with the Ontario Parks website, allowing users to browse, submit, and manage reviews for campsites directly on the map interface.
